morningBrief.headline: 6" of Fresh Overnight
morningBrief.body: Mother Nature delivered 6" of the good stuff. Face shots are on the menu. The whole mountain is basically open. Go explore. Watch for crowds at Big Easy, which saw 11-minute waits yesterday.

morningBrief.headline: Deep Day at Northstar
morningBrief.body: Wake up, it's a powder day! 7" overnight means hero snow everywhere. Peak terrain status: almost everything is available today. Watch for crowds at Big Springs Express Gondola, which saw 14-minute waits yesterday.

morningBrief.headline: Not a Cloud in Sight
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 7" over the last week. Watch for crowds at #7 TC Express, which saw 11-minute waits yesterday. It's a postcard kind of day. 32° and sunny - the mountain is photogenic.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Hog Wild - perfect for intermediate skiers

morningBrief.body: The rundown: 38 trails open, 19 groomed. Partly Cloudy with temps around 38°. Snow showers in the forecast with a few inches expected. Conditions should improve.

morningBrief.headline: Postcard Day
morningBrief.body: Steady snowfall with 11" over the last week. 6 runs freshly groomed, mostly in 7th Heaven, Emerald / Garbanzo / Village Gondola - Upper, and more. Heads up: 7th Heaven Express peaked at 37 minutes yesterday. Consider alternatives.

morningBrief.headline: The Mountain Got Buried
morningBrief.body: Powder alert: 8" of fresh overnight means soft conditions across the mountain. Nearly full mountain access with 118 of 123 trails spinning. Windy conditions expected. Upper lifts may have holds or delays.

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Yellow Trail - all skill levels

morningBrief.headline: Fresh Snow, Fresh Vibes
morningBrief.body: 3" settled in while you were sleeping. Groomers are smooth, off-piste is soft. 14 new runs just opened up. Time to explore fresh terrain. Light snow possible in the forecast.
